title: WaiWaiWai!
detail_text: <:th_ch0109/>I’m so nervous about today’s event~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Hehehe... Shall I help you shake off that nervousness? With this secret remedy known only to fallen angels...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ah, let me have some. Nom nom...<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Ahh!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>What a tasty cough drop~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>It’s not a cough drop! It’s a secret remedy!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>Can Ruby have some too?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Sure, here you go.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0109/>It’s peach-flavored~~~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Don’t say it’s peach-flavored! It’s a secret remedy, I’m telling you!!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
